summary: Have you ever wanted to feel like a pro Skyrim-er? Are you just looking for a more interesting and dope way to play the game?? This is the mod for you (check it out)
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][color=#cc0000][size=6]????ARE YOU A SKYRIM MLG????
(Major League Gamer) [/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][i][size=4][b]-For those of you who don't know MLG's reputation. You will pretty soon[/b][/size][/i]
[/font][i][b][size=4]-This mod changes many sounds in the game to use the infamous MLG quotable s.[/size]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53069-1-1411524527.jpg[/img]
[font=Courier New][size=2]Credit for Pic goes to Darnell Nugget (what a dope azz name boyz)

[/size][/font][size=5]!!!!!Update!!!!!
-New lockpicking sounds
-New objective sounds
-New shout sounds
-New bard Music
-Rip NazzSwegMastrFgtCrusher420LoominatiEMINEM
[/size]
[size=5]Google[/size]
[size=4]-History[/size]
[font=Courier New]how 2 no suk?
can i dank quickscope 2 hrd?
how big my wanker spuosed to b?
wy mi m8s fuk wit me 2 muych?
is betty whites puzzy still tighttss?[/font]
----ur histry not mine dank azz hardscoppers----
[/b][size=4]Includes---[/size]
[size=4]-Better alchemy potion creation[/size]
[size=2]smoke wead ery dayy [/size]
[size=4]-Better sneak killing[/size]
[size=2]MUM GET THE CAMERA[/size]
[size=4]-Better bow sniping 
[/size]Cod Hit marker noise
[size=4]-Better dying music 
[/size]Airporn and 2sedforme
[size=4]-Way more dank main menu music 
[/size]Some dank azz song
[/i]
[font=Courier New]Technical shat for people who care
[/font]http://www.soundboard.com/sb/mlgsoundboard

[color=#cc0000][size=4][b][i]~Changes[/i][/b][/size][/color]
[font=Courier New]-alchemy
-hits with arrows
-death
-main menu music 
-sneak attacks
-[s]dank juice [/s]
-more to come...

[/font][center][font=Courier New]This mod only [u]changes sounds listed[/u].
Compatibility may vary

[/font][color=#cc0000][size=4]---Install(NMM)---[/size][/color]
Download and install M8

[color=#cc0000][size=4]---Install(manuall)--[/size]-[/color]
I put all the files in the file pathes that they should be so just follow the file brick road

If you dont like it m8 shut ur cheeky gabber [/center]
author: Darnell Nugget
